Buy a domain for LUMT

I know I’ve said I don’t want to make any money with this project, but this doesn’t give me money, but it gives LUMT a more trustworthy look and maybe lets users not think the moment they enter the page This website has a sub-subdomain, I think it’s a scam! and let’s them discover the useful ressources LUMT provides.

I want to buy a domain for LUMT!

First of all: Thank you for considering it. Thank you so much.

If you want to buy a domain for LUMT, please contact me.
